ISSUE.TITLE: Sitemap ignores store mappings for languages
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50.2 > We activated "SEO friendly URLs with multiple languages enabled" at /Admin/Setting/GeneralCommon to have /en / fr in our domain for 2 different languages. > > It works ok and robots txt too. But the sitemap is including all existing languages, in this case 5, instead of the 2 assign to that store. > > So we should have 2 urls for each product but we have 5. > the 3 language that should not appear in sitemap are limited to other stores. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/94679/sitemap-includes-other-languages-than-the-store-ones
